Song.title: I Must Have You
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Steve & Vikki Cook © 1999 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [Asus A | Asus A | Esus E | Esus E]
Verse 1: [Asus]I drink [A]deep from Your [Asus]well of [A]grace And it’s [Esus]sweet, [E]so sweet to my s[Esus E]oul For [Asus]none can [A]quench this [Asus]thirsting [A]Of my h[Esus]eart but [E]You al[Esus E]one Be[Bm]cause You have made me to kn[D]ow And enjoy You for[Bm]ever, I cry to Y[G]ou
Chorus: Lord I must have [Asus]You, [A]Your goodness, Your tr[Asus A]uth I am con[Esus]sumed [E]with passion for Y[D]ou The One who has s[Asus]aved me [A] The One who sust[Asus]ains me, [A]I’m desperate it’s true [Esus ] [E]Lord, I must have Y[D]ou.
Verse 2: [Asus]I’m pos[A]sessed with a [Asus]hunger [A]To beh[Esus]old [E]Your majes[Esus E]ty And [Asus]I’m ob[A]sessed with the [Asus]wonder [A]That You, my G[Esus]od, would [E]die for m[Esus E]e Be[Bm]cause of the cross I will pr[D]aise I will love You for[Bm]ever, so I cry to Y[G]ou
Bridge: [G]Do I need the air to breathe [F#m]Do I need for my heart to beat? [G]Not as much [A]as [Bm]I [A]need [E (to chorus)]You
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 i drink deep from your well of grace and its sweet so sweet to my soul for none can quench this thirsting of my heart but you alone because you have made me to know and enjoy you forever i cry to you chorus lord i must have you your goodness your truth i am consumed with passion for you the one who has saved me the one who sustains me im desperate its true lord i must have you verse 2 im possessed with a hunger to behold your majesty and im obsessed with the wonder that you my god would die for me because of the cross i will praise i will love you forever so i cry to you bridge do i need the air to breathe do i need for my heart to beat not as much as i need you
